task.title: Initialize Livefyre Identity
task.shortdesc: The Livefyre.js Auth package ensures that all social components on your page can discover a single authentication integration.

context.p: Livefyre provides an lfep-auth-delegate package that will make an appropriate auth delegate for you. Auth must be provided an AuthDelegate object that knows how to perform authentication actions, like login and logout.
